name: Sunlight Curse
description:
MADE FOR BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2k18.

DOWNLOAD FOR BETTER SOUND EXPERIENCE.

Sunlight Curse is a game where you play as a little cute boy who is helping a vampire to escape to his castle by killing people. Those people are shooting gralic at the vampire, they are so mean!!!

CONTROLS:

Move with WASD, aim and shoot with the mouse.

!!THE GAME CONTAINS SOME SMALL GLITCHES AND BUGS, IF U FIND ONE OF THEM PLS TELL ME IN THE COMMENTS BELOW, SO ICAN FIX IT, THANKS!!

I hope you'll enjoy the game and have fun playing it as much as I enjoyed making it :D.
